function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of partition in cubicles allowing direct transmission of aerosols between occupants","Impact":"Increased risk of aerosol transmission of SARS-CoV-2 within the general ward","Mitigation":"Install partitions or barriers between cubicles to prevent direct transmission of aerosols","Technologies":"Use of modular wall systems or clear acrylic dividers to create barriers between cubicles","People":"Occupants of the general ward","Owner":"Facility management or healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"High rates of positivity for SARS-CoV-2 aerosol exposure in air and swab samples","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for occupants and healthcare workers in the general ward","Mitigation":"Implement increased ventilation and air filtration systems, and enforce strict infection control measures","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C air disinfection systems, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Occupants and healthcare workers in the general ward","Owner":"Facility management or healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 aerosol at all sampling sites, including near air outlets and in patients' rooms","Impact":"High probability of aerosol spread within the ward, increasing the risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implement targeted ventilation and air disinfection strategies at all sampling sites, and enforce strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Placement of air purifiers, use of ultrasonic humidifiers, and installation of ventilation exhaust systems","People":"Occupants and healthcare workers in the general ward","Owner":"Facility management or healthcare administrators"}]}
